name: PREempt® RTU Disinfectant Solution
description: PREempt® RTU Disinfectant Solution employs Accelerated Hydrogen Peroxide® (AHP®), a patented synergistic blend of commonly used ingredients that, when combined with PREempt® RTU Disinfectant Solution, results in Low levels of hydrogen peroxide significantly improve its cleaning and efficacy. performance. AHP combines hydrogen peroxide, surfactants, and wetting agents. Chelating agents are used to create a one-step disinfectant cleaner. AHP is a one-of-a-kind formulation that strikes the ideal balance between fast and slow contact. time while maintaining cleaning effectiveness It also does not have a hazard classification. PREempt® RTU Disinfectant Solution claims broad-spectrum non-food contact sanitizing in 30 seconds. seconds, 1 minute for bactericidal claim, 1 minute for general virucide claim, and In 10 minutes, you can make a fungicidal claim.
